name: PM Kisan Samman Nidhi
description: Financial benefit of Rs 6000 per year to landholding farmer families, payable in three equal installments of Rs 2000 each.
eligibility: Must be a farmer. Must own cultivable land. Excludes institutional landholders and high-income groups.Income should be below 2.5 Lakhs.
documents: Aadhaar Card, Landholding papers, Bank Account details.

name: Ayushman Bharat PM-JAY
description: Health assurance scheme providing cover of Rs 5 lakhs per family per year for secondary and tertiary care hospitalization.
eligibility: Families listed in SECC 2011 database, low income, rural families with no adult male member 16-59 years.

name: Pradhan Mantri Awas Yojana (Urban)
description: Provides pucca house to eligible urban poor. Interest subsidy on home loans.
eligibility: Annual family income up to Rs 18 Lakhs. The family should not own a pucca house in India.
documents: Income Proof, Aadhaar, PAN Card, Voter ID.

name: Atal Pension Yojana
description: Guaranteed monthly pension of Rs 1000 to Rs 5000 for unorganized sector workers.
eligibility: Age between 18-40 years. Must have a savings bank account.

name: Pradhan Mantri Awas Yojana - Gramin (PMAY-G)
description: A housing scheme to provide pucca houses with basic amenities to all houseless households and those living in kutcha and dilapidated houses in rural areas.
eligibility: Homeless families, families with kutcha houses, no adult male member between 16-59 years, landless households deriving major income from casual labour.
documents: Financial assistance of Rs 1.20 Lakh in plains and Rs 1.30 Lakh in hilly states for construction of a house. Additional assistance for toilet construction under Swachh Bharat Mission.

name: Ayushman Bharat Pradhan Mantri Jan Arogya Yojana (PM-JAY)
description: The world's largest government-funded healthcare program targeting more than 50 crore beneficiaries.
eligibility: Families listed in SECC 2011 database based on deprivation criteria (e.g., households with only one room with kucha walls and roof, female-headed households with no adult male member).
documents: Health coverage of Rs 5 Lakh per family per year for secondary and tertiary care hospitalization in public and private empaneled hospitals. Cashless access to health care services.

name: Pradhan Mantri Mudra Yojana (PMMY)
description: A scheme to provide loans up to 10 Lakh to non-corporate, non-farm small/micro enterprises.
eligibility: Any Indian Citizen who has a business plan for a non-farm sector income generating activity such as manufacturing, processing, trading or service sector.
documents: Loans in three categories: Shishu (up to Rs 50,000), Kishore (Rs 50,000 to Rs 5 Lakh), and Tarun (Rs 5 Lakh to Rs 10 Lakh). No collateral security required.
